Advanced

From $0 to $5000
Advanced
Home area (sqft) 0 - 450
From $0 to $5000
What are you looking for?
  • Long-term Rentals
  • Short-term Rentals
  • Shop
NEST LIVING

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT

It is important to love the space where you live. It’s where you relax, rest every night, cook, spend time with loved ones and build memorties that collectively form your life. This place shouldn’t just feel like another building that you come back to everyday… It should feel like a home. It should feel like your NEST.

The process of finding a new space is not an easy task, even more so while living in a foreign country. Language barriers, misfit properties, difficult agents… there is a long list that can make your search discouraging, and it’s even harder to connect with an agent that truly understands your needs.

NEST is a new way to search, move and curate your own living space abroad.
